verses.name: 1 Kings 11:34
verses.text: Howbeit I will not take the whole kingdom out of his hand: but I will make him prince all the days of his life for David my servant’s sake, whom I chose, because he kept my commandments and my statutes:

verses.name: 1 Kings 11:35
verses.text: But I will take the kingdom out of his son’s hand, and will give it unto thee, even ten tribes.

verses.name: 1 Kings 11:36
verses.text: And unto his son will I give one tribe, that David my servant may have a light alway before me in Jerusalem, the city which I have chosen me to put my name there.
